text: 5|7|(yūtarkaḷē!) Uṅkaḷ mītuḷḷa allāhviṉ aruḷaiyum, avaṉ (uṅkaḷiṭam) vākkuṟuti vāṅkiya poḻutu atai nīṅkaḷ uṟutippaṭutti ‘‘nāṅkaḷ cevicāyttōm. (Uṉakku) kaṭṭuppaṭṭōm'' eṉṟu nīṅkaḷ kūṟiyataiyum ñāpakappaṭuttik koṇṭu allāhvukkup payappaṭuṅkaḷ. (Ēṉeṉṟāl,) niccayamāka allāh (uṅkaḷ) uḷḷaṅkaḷil uḷḷavaṟṟai naṉkaṟintavaṉ āvāṉ
